findings.title: _withUpdate variable setting error
findings.description: If the update is not specified, the user's reward calculation may not be updated in time, resulting in abnormal calculation of the reward.

findings.title: Improperly designed setOwnerFFCReward function
findings.description: In the function _updatePool_ , the owner can set the proportion of coins minted for himself without any restrictions.

findings.title: The owner authority is too high
findings.description: The FFCv2 variable used in the function _safeFFCTransfer_ can be changed by owner, If the token address is changed, the rewards received by users may not be consistent with the promotion.

findings.title: Missing event triggers
findings.description: Missing event triggers for important parameter changes.

findings.title: Improperly designed add function
findings.description: In the _add function, it is not mandatory to specify whether to update all staking pools. If the update is not specified, the user's reward calculation may not be updated in time, resulting in abnormal calculation of the reward.

findings.title: _add, set_ functions do not specify whether to update all staking pools
findings.description: If the update is not specified, the user's reward calculation may not be updated in time, resulting in abnormal calculation of the reward.

findings.title: Unrestricted Coin Minting by Owner
findings.description: In the _updatePool_ function, the owner can set the proportion of coins minted for himself without any restrictions.

findings.title: The FFCv2 variable used in the function _safeFFCTransfer_ can be changed by owner
findings.description: If the token address is changed, the rewards received by users may not be consistent with the promotion.

findings.title: Missing event triggers for important parameter changes
findings.description: Missing event triggers for important parameter changes.

findings.title: Improperly designed add function
findings.description: If the same strategy pool is added repeatedly, the if judgment will be skipped
